attributes.action: Change how companies advertise on their products - whether or not they test on animals
attributes.additional_details: We want to make sure that animal testing is advertised clearly on any household or cosmetic products so as consumers we can be sure that we are buying what we think is right. If that means you buy an animal tested product and agree with it that's ok but if we don't agree with it we want the choice - to buy something whilst assured its not tested on animals and not against our beliefs.
